actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1040.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 6075 to amend the Public Buildings Act of 1959, to authorize the Administrator of General Services to issue obligations for the construction and acquisition of public buildings, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6075 (authorizes obligations for the construction and acquisition of public buildings).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 6075 to amend the Public Buildings Act of 1959, to authorize the Administrator of General Services to issue obligations for the construction and acquisition of public buildings, and for other purposes.
